title: /MUTE ALL
body:
When the community tilts you so much and people are so toxic every single game, you /mute all at the start of the game. EVERY. SINGLE. GAME. NOW.

Like seriously, it's gotten to the point where I start typing whole essays towards that one toxic player, then mute after. Every time I do so, my brain feels like it's going to explode {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Arguing with a wall is about as insane as it gets. So yeah, your brain hurts. If they're toxic. Mute, report and move on.
